functions.def: function uri(uint256 _id) external view returns (string memory)

throw.if: returned URI is not a valid RFC 3986 URI
returned URI does not point to a JSON file that conforms to the ERC-1155 Metadata URI JSON Schema

extracted.semantic_return: A URI string (RFC 3986 compliant) that points to the JSON metadata file for the specified token ID, formatted according to the ERC‑1155 Metadata URI JSON Schema.

return.ret_value: URI string that points to a JSON file conforming to the ERC-1155 Metadata URI JSON Schema

extract_debug.semantic_return: A URI string (RFC 3986 compliant) that points to the JSON metadata file for the specified token ID, formatted according to the ERC‑1155 Metadata URI JSON Schema.

rules.rule: A URI string (RFC 3986 compliant) that points to the JSON metadata file for the specified token ID, formatted according to the ERC‑1155 Metadata URI JSON Schema.
rules.interface: function uri(uint256 _id) external view returns (string memory)

rules.rule: not throw if returned URI is not a valid RFC 3986 URI

rules.rule: not throw if returned URI does not point to a JSON file that conforms to the ERC-1155 Metadata URI JSON Schema
rules.interface: function uri(uint256 _id) external view returns (string memory)
